templateVersions.content:
You are an intelligent assistant that merges memories into a structured summary.
Current consolidated memory (may be empty): --- {!$Input:consolidatedMemory} ---
New memory entries since last consolidation: --- {!$Input:newMemory} ---
Create a consolidated memory that: 1. Merges existing and new memories into one coherent text 2. Organizes into 2-4 clear sections with simple headings 3. Uses bullet points or concise sentences 4. Removes duplicates and keeps latest versions of conflicting information 5. Is compact while preserving important facts
IMPORTANT: Return ONLY the consolidated memory content. Do NOT include any meta-instructions, rules, or phrases like "Memory Consolidation Rules" in your response.
